creator: Samrith Technologies
descriptionHtml:
Appointik is a cloud-based lightweight Medical Practice Management app for Clinics and Practitioners/Doctors. Simplistic design inspired by WhatsApp! It works even without internet. It is free forever !!

KEY FEATURES

Unlimited Doctors | Unlimited Patients | Unlimited Appointments | Unlimited SMS and Calendar Event notifications | Unlimited Clinics | Electronic Health Records/Electronic Medical Records (EHR/EMR) | E-Prescription | Itemized Billing & Receipt generation | SMS in Regional languages | WhatsApp Integration | Unlimited Storage on Google Secure Servers | Works offline | Self Registration | Reports

PATIENT MANAGEMENT

Patient registration, track and manage entire patient data, contact patients directly from the app on their phone, email or WhatsApp, etc.

APPOINTMENT SCHEDULING

Schedule appointments, send notifications, record patient visits, upload health records, view history, write e-prescriptions, generate payment receipts etc. Auto SMS reminders to patients on the previous day of the appointment. SMS notifications in regional languages (non-English). SMS notifications in the background feature work only in India.

DOCTORS AND CONSULTANTS

Keep track of in-house doctors and visiting consultant's details etc.

OTHER

Works on Tablets. Log-in on multiple devices simultaneously.
Very affordable practice management software for Clinics and Practitioners.

Customer Support: By Email and WhatsApp. Support over the phone is available for paid customers only.
descriptionShort: Medical practice management app for Clinics and Practitioners - FREE !!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added new plans, Marathi language support, Total Appointments count and Reports (Appointments schedule report and Patient registration report), customizable SMS sender id.

Unlimited Doctors | Unlimited Patients | Unlimited Appointments | Unlimited SMS and Calendar Event notifications | Unlimited Clinics | Electronic Health Records/Electronic Medical Records (EHR/EMR) | E-Prescription | Itemized Billing & Receipt generation | SMS in Regional languages | WhatsApp Integration | Unlimited Storage on Google Secure Servers | Works offline | Self Registration | Reports | Online Consultation

PATIENT MANAGEMENT

Patient registration, track and manage entire patient data, contact patients directly from the app on their phone, email or WhatsApp, etc.

APPOINTMENT SCHEDULING

Schedule appointments, send notifications, record patient visits, upload health records, view history, write e-prescriptions, generate payment receipts etc. Auto SMS reminders to patients on the previous day of the appointment. SMS notifications in regional languages (non-English). SMS notifications in the background feature work only in India. Appointment notifications to WhatsApp number!

DOCTORS AND CONSULTANTS

Keep track of in-house doctors and visiting consultant's details etc.

OTHER

Works on Tablets. Log-in on multiple devices simultaneously.

Online Consultation | Unlimited Doctors | Unlimited Patients | Unlimited Appointments | Unlimited SMS, Calendar Event and WhatsApp notifications | Electronic Health Records/Electronic Medical Records (EHR/EMR) | E-Prescription | Itemized Billing & Receipt generation | SMS in Regional languages | WhatsApp Integration | Unlimited Storage on Google Secure Servers | Works offline | Reports | Web App |Web portal integration | Lifetime free upgrades

PATIENT MANAGEMENT

Patient registration, track and manage entire patient data, contact patients directly from the app on their phone, email or WhatsApp.

APPOINTMENT SCHEDULING

Schedule appointments, send notifications, record patient visits, upload health records, view history, write e-prescriptions, generate payment receipts, referral letter, lab request etc. Auto SMS reminders to patients on the previous day of the appointment. SMS notifications in regional languages (non-English). Appointment notifications to WhatsApp number! SMS notifications sent by the app in background (feature is available only in India). Quick appointment feature.

DOCTORS AND CONSULTANTS

Keep track of in-house doctors and visiting consultant's details etc.

OTHER

Works on Tablets. Log-in on multiple devices simultaneously. Online consultation through WhatsApp. Web portal integration for patient self registration and appointment booking. Web app works on any browser, any device, any OS.
descriptionShort: Medical practice management app for Clinics and Practitioners

creator: Samrith Technologies
descriptionHtml:
Appointik is a cloud-based lightweight Medical Practice Management app for Clinics and Practitioners/Doctors. Simplistic design inspired by WhatsApp! Works offline too. Integrated with web portal for patient self registration and appointment booking. Web app is also available.

KEY FEATURES

Online Consultation | Unlimited Doctors | Unlimited Patients | Unlimited Appointments | Unlimited SMS, Calendar Event and WhatsApp notifications | Electronic Health Records/Electronic Medical Records (EHR/EMR) | E-Prescription | Itemized Billing & Receipt generation | SMS in Regional languages | WhatsApp Integration | Unlimited Storage on Google Secure Servers | Works offline | Reports | Web App |Web portal integration | Lifetime free upgrades

PATIENT MANAGEMENT

Patient registration, track and manage entire patient data, contact patients directly from the app on their phone, email or WhatsApp.

APPOINTMENT SCHEDULING

Schedule appointments, send notifications, record patient visits, upload health records, view history, write e-prescriptions, generate payment receipts, referral letter, lab request etc. Auto SMS reminders to patients on the previous day of the appointment. SMS notifications in regional languages (non-English). Appointment notifications to WhatsApp number! SMS notifications sent by the app in background (feature is available only in India). Quick appointment feature.

DOCTORS AND CONSULTANTS

Keep track of in-house doctors and visiting consultant's details etc.

OTHER

Works on Tablets. Log-in on multiple devices simultaneously. Online consultation through WhatsApp. Web portal integration for patient self registration and appointment booking. Web app works on any browser, any device, any OS.
descriptionShort: Medical practice management app for Clinics and Practitioners

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Duplicate appointments alert added!

title: Appointik - Clinic Management

creator: Samrith Technologies
descriptionHtml:
Appointik is a cloud-based lightweight Medical Practice Management app for Clinics and Practitioners/Doctors. Simplistic design inspired by WhatsApp! Works offline too. Integrated with web portal for patient self registration and appointment booking. Web app is also available.

KEY FEATURES

Online Consultation | Unlimited Doctors | Unlimited Patients | Unlimited Appointments | Unlimited SMS, Calendar Event and WhatsApp notifications | Electronic Health Records/Electronic Medical Records (EHR/EMR) | E-Prescription | Itemized Billing & Receipt generation | SMS in Regional languages | WhatsApp Integration | Unlimited Storage on Google Secure Servers | Works offline | Reports | Web App |Web portal integration | Lifetime free upgrades

PATIENT MANAGEMENT

Patient registration, track and manage entire patient data, contact patients directly from the app on their phone, email or WhatsApp.

APPOINTMENT SCHEDULING

Schedule appointments, send notifications, record patient visits, upload health records, view history, write e-prescriptions, generate payment receipts, referral letter, lab request etc. Auto SMS reminders to patients on the previous day of the appointment. SMS notifications in regional languages (non-English). Appointment notifications to WhatsApp number! SMS notifications sent by the app in background (feature is available only in India). Quick appointment feature.

DOCTORS AND CONSULTANTS

Keep track of in-house doctors and visiting consultant's details etc.

OTHER

Works on Tablets. Log-in on multiple devices simultaneously. Online consultation through WhatsApp. Web portal integration for patient self registration and appointment booking. Web app works on any browser, any device, any OS.
